subject: Gambling
Football
Fantasy Sports
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. has long opposed sports betting, but in Britain, where sports betting is legal and which now hosts N.F.L. games, the line has been blurred.
snippet: The N.F.L. has long opposed sports betting, but in Britain, where sports betting is legal and which now hosts N.F.L. games, the line has been blurred.
